subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Tour de Suisse (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Peter Sagan struggled earlier in the year, but victory in the Tour of California shows he is back in form to win another Tour de France green jersey.
snippet: Peter Sagan struggled earlier in the year, but victory in the Tour of California shows he is back in form to win another Tour de France green jersey.
